summary: When his father is killed in a train wreck, Larry Baker vows to unmask a mysterious criminal called "The Wrecker," who has targeted the L&M Railroad for deadly" accidents."

Farrell MacDonald|Al Ferguson|Glenn Strange|Victor Adamson|Yakima Canutt|Henry Hall|Rodney Hildebrand|Eddie Parker|Fred Parker|Fred 'Snowflake' Toones
keywords: poverty row film|low budget film|double feature film|serial|cliffhanger
title: El expreso de la muerte
